data.name: Basketball Girls
data.detailed_description:
It is time for you to take your place as coach to the new all girls basketball team, help the team grow throughout the summer and maybe win their first championship, with fun surprises along the way as you manage the team and indulge in romance as well.

* * * * *

After your best friend Alexa, guilt trips you into agreeing to coach the team, you quickly realise this new job will take up all your free time, between researching the opposing teams strategies and ensuring your players are stress free and relaxed in between the games, it really will be a wild ride.

Features

* Huge Story with six main girls each with their own stories to explore.
* Over 12 standard endings based on your choice in the game.
* Special Secret Endings to unlock, such as the Harem Ending.
* Build Romantic Relationships with the Girls or just have a fling.
* Amazing Artwork Illustrations and a Gallery to unlock.
* Steam Achievements and Trading Cards.

Optional: Uncensored Edition is available as a free download.
- Adds more CG Scenes, Explicit Scenes & Dialogue AND Animated Scenes.
- See the Community Hub on release for more details.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
